content: MH-EMTV Strut clamp Pre-assembled strut clamp with tightening screw on top for easy access for attaching tubing and pipes to strut channels ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Pipe supports- - - ### FEATURES:Features Pre-assembled out of box Tightening screw on top for easy access Sized for electrical metallic tubing Applications Mechanical piping systems - used to support and secure HVAC, plumbing, or other mechanical pipes within industrial or commercial buildings, ensuring they are held firmly in place within strut channels Electrical conduit installation - used for securing electrical metallic tubing (EMT) and other types of conduits to strut channels, particularly in environments where precise and stable alignment of electrical infrastructure is critical Utility piping - suitable for securing various types of utility piping in environments that require a durable and easy-to-install solution ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Clamping screw | 1/4-20 UNC | Tightening torque | 3 ft-lbf | Cross section width - b | 25/32 in ### ITEMS- 2008827 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 1/2 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008828 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 3/4 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008829 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 1 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008830 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 1-1/4 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008831 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 1-1/2 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008832 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 2 PG - Package Size 25 pc - 2008833 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 2-1/2 PG - Package Size 25 pc - 2008834 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 3 PG - Package Size 10 pc - 2008835 - EMT strut clamp MH-EMTV 4 - Package Size 10 pc
